custom-action.name: sendqtestcontext
custom-action.description:
Send the Qtest Context to NeoLoad WEB ( required to push the results in Qtest).
Possible parameters are: - ProjectName (required): Project name in UiPath Test Manager Default value is "Project name in UiPath Test Manager". - TestCycle (required): Test Cylce name Default value is "Test Cycle Name". - ReleaseName (required): Release Name Default value is "Release Name". - EnableDefectCreation (optional): Enable the creation of defects if an SLA Fails Default value is "false".
